welcome.title: Divine Reaper
welcome.subtitle: Created by Aexis Protocol
welcome.desc1: The first truly revolutionary, permissionless play-to-earn and play-to-learn game built entirely on blockchain.
welcome.desc2: Dive into a fantasy world full of agony and revenge. Choose your race, class, and set out on expeditions, find or craft enchanting gear, learn unique skills, and avenge your parents.
welcome.desc3: Powered by Supra, the next generation of Web3.

faq.a1: Divine Reaper is an innovative game that combines playing, learning, and earning while remaining decentralized and permissionless.
faq.a2: Yes, soon there will be two free options available. The first is on-chain, where we cover transaction fees for you. The second is centralized and does not require a Supra wallet. Premium users get 50% more Loyal Points, no ads, and access to XPerience in the Aexis Protocol Level System with unique rewards. PS: Premium costs 100$ Supra at character creation + transaction fees per our index.
faq.q3: 3.Q | Which blockchain does Divine Reaper use?
faq.a3: Divine Reaper is fully powered by Supra’s scalable infrastructure for Web3 gaming.
faq.q4: 4.Q | Is Divine Reaper really permissionless and decentralized?
faq.a4: Yes, everything is transparent and on the blockchain. Everyone can create their own API to interact with Divine Reaper modules via our documentation.
faq.a5: Loyal Points are special rewards that can be used to: 1. Reduce Premium fees according to point amounts. 2. Exchange for $Supra (and other future tokens). 3. Stake for rewards and faster progress in Aexis Protocol. 4. Vote on proposals (e.g., balance changes, updates).
faq.q6: 6.Q | How can I withdraw Loyal Points?
faq.a6: Loyal Points can be withdrawn only during a two-week window after the season ends (server reset).
faq.q7: 7.Q | Does Divine Reaper have an official Telegram channel?
faq.a7: Not yet, but one is planned for the future – probably next year.
faq.a8: Check our list of error codes. For unknown errors, contact us via Discord, test@gmail.com, or message this module.
faq.q9: 9.Q | Can I change my class or race?
faq.a9: Yes, main data like class, race, inventory, and rewards are immutable but can be updated.
faq.q10: 10.Q | How can I contact the team?
faq.a10: You can contact us via Discord, email, or the upcoming support portal.
